title: Looking for support and adc for clash team/memes :^)
body: I'm plat 1 jg main, our top is gold 5, the mid is silver 3, so any ranks around silver/gold are okay :)

replies.body:
My friend and I would like to join your team.
I am plat 2 support and he's gold 5 (he can fill top, mid, adc) 
Thanks and I have added you!
